items.longDescription:
Monochrome Mickey Mouse Art by Joshua Vides

Southern California based artist Joshua Vides drew exclusive artworks for Uniqlo UT, featuring the most loved Disney character Mickey Mouse and his friends. Enjoy the new collection where Mickey Mouse and Art come together!

Joshua Vides
Joshua Vides is a Southern California based illustrator and visual artist. His work defines the premise of pop art through immersive installations and range of limited products. His latest concept, Reality to Idea, highlights the shape and form of objects through a Black & White comic-like perspective.

©Disney
items.name: MEN Monochrome Mickey Long Sleeve Sweatshirt
items.shortDescription: Check out the new artistic UT collection for Mickey Mouse and his friends!

- JWA logo embroidery at the hem.
items.name: MEN Oversized Striped Short Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: 100% cotton for a fresh, comfortable feel. This loose-fitting shirt also makes a great outer layer.

items.longDescription:
- Made of 100% ultra-long cotton fibers with an elegant texture.
- Soft and wrinkle-resistant twill fabric.
- The fabric has been processed to give it a soft, luxurious yet casual feel.
- The oversized cut works well on its own or as an outer layer.
- Sleeve seams match the direction of the arms.
- Design features a straight hem, slits in the sides, and tape on the back of the placket, making it suitable as an outer layer.
- Looks great worn alone for an oversized look.
items.name: MEN Extra Fine Cotton Twill Oversized Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: 100% premium cotton with a casual feel. The short length makes this shirt an easy outer layer.

items.longDescription:
New LifeWear that combines UNIQLO’s focus on design, fit, fabric, and functionality with JW ANDERSON’s focus on traditional British apparel into innovative designs.

- 100% cotton in contrasting patterns and weaves.
- 3-needle stitching detail at the shoulders, armholes, sides, and back inspired by classic workwear.
- Yacht embroidery at the chest.
- A signature JWA combination of tonal solid colors and prints.
- Perfect on its own or as an outer layer.
- A casual shirt in a roomy, oversized cut.
items.name: MEN Oversized Striped Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: A workwear-style shirt in JWA’s signature colors and prints.

items.longDescription:
- Lined, with a relaxed fit that feels great no matter the temperature.
- Convenient size adjusters on both sides.
items.name: MEN Coach Jacket
items.shortDescription: Relaxed, loose-fitting cut for an easy-to-wear outer layer. The hem tightens for a different look.

items.longDescription:
New LifeWear that combines UNIQLO’s focus on design, fit, fabric, and functionality with JW ANDERSON’s focus on traditional British apparel into innovative designs.

- Made with cool 100% cotton chambray fabric.

- Yacht embroidery at the chest pocket.
- Perfect on its own or as an outer layer.
- A casual shirt in a roomy, oversized cut.

items.shortDescription: A workwear-style shirt with distinctive stitching in a JWA design.

items.longDescription:
- Wrinkle resistant for easy care.

items.shortDescription: Sophisticated yet comfortable. Versatile pants for any occasion.

items.longDescription:
The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.

- Soft denim made from a blend of cotton and linen.
- Workwear-inspired denim jacket.
- 4 large, practical patch pockets including a handy interior pocket.
items.name: MEN Over Shirt Jacket (Denim)
items.shortDescription: Made of soft denim for comfort. With pockets for storage.

items.longDescription:
New LifeWear that combines UNIQLO’s focus on design, fit, fabric, and functionality with JW ANDERSON’s focus on traditional British apparel into innovative designs.

- Authentic 100% cotton Kaihara denim.
- 5-pocket jeans with an on-trend shoe cut that flares out slightly from knee to hem.
- Cut-off hems for a casual look.
- Accent red stitching on the front button holes.
- JWA logo embroidery on the edge of the right rear pocket.
items.name: MEN Shoe Cut Jeans
items.shortDescription: Distinctive slightly flared hem. Red stitching adds a signature JWA touch.

items.longDescription:
The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.

- Compact and lightweight 100% cotton poplin fabric.
- Straight cut with a relaxed fit.
- Workwear-inspired jacket.
- 4 large, practical patch pockets including a handy interior pocket.
items.name: MEN Over Shirt Jacket
items.shortDescription: This shirt jacket makes an easy throw-on layer. With pockets for storage.

items.composition: Body: 65% Lyocell, 35% Cotton/ Rib: 71% Polyester, 26% Cotton, 3% Elastane

The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.

- Supple, flowing lyocell-cotton blend fabric.
- Inspired by the classic tropical tour jacket.
- Boxy fit with a relaxed fit at the shoulders and a roomy straight cut at the waist.
- Knit fabric collar and stretchy cuffs.

items.longDescription:
The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.

items.longDescription:
The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.

- Made of 100% ultra-lightweight compact cotton.
- Features a stretchy trim to keep the rain out, and a pack-away hood that can be stowed in the collar.
- Vents in the front and back yoke allow fresh air to circulate while keeping out the rain.
- Cut for maximum freedom of movement and comfort.
items.name: MEN Oversized Hooded Jacket
items.shortDescription: Clever details protect you from the elements. Fabric and cut carefully designed for comfort.

New LifeWear that combines UNIQLO’s focus on design, fit, fabric, and functionality with JW ANDERSON’s focus on traditional British apparel into innovative designs.

items.composition: Shell: 100% Polyamide/ Body Lining: 65% Polyester, 35% Cotton/ Sleeve Lining: 100% Polyester
items.longDescription:
The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
